agent_utterance: Plan for the next 10 minutes: 1) drink 250–300 ml cold water to help with the heat. 2) do 2 rounds of box breathing (4-4-4-4) for about 2 minutes. 3) rate your hunger on a 0–10 scale. Remember you can pause anytime and reach out to your support person if anxiety rises. Want me to set a quick 30-minute reminder for a check-in?
